name: PodBed Coogee Beachside
description:
Welcome to Our Family-Run Hostel: Your Home Away from Home!

At our family-run establishment, we strive to create a warm, welcoming, and comfortable atmosphere for all our guests. Whether you’re here for work, leisure, or just passing through, we aim to provide a peaceful retreat where you can relax and feel at home.

Our friendly team is dedicated to making your stay as enjoyable as possible, but we also ask for your cooperation in respecting our house rules, which help us maintain a comfortable environment for everyone.

House Rules:

Rent is Due in Advance – Full payment is required to confirm your booking. No booking will be held without full payment.
Extensions – If you'd like to extend your stay, please notify us at least 24 hours before your check-out time. No extensions will be allowed after 10:00 AM on your check-out day.
Damage and Security Bond – By signing this form, you agree to allow management to charge for any documented damage caused during your stay. Upon check-in, we will pre-authorize a $50 security bond. If any damage exceeds this amount, you will be charged the full cost of repairs.
Kindness and Respect – Please treat our staff and fellow guests with kindness and respect. A positive attitude creates a better atmosphere for everyone!
Kitchen Hours – The kitchen closes at 10:00 PM. Please ensure you prepare your meals or late-night snacks before then.
Clean Up After Yourself – Wash your dishes and clean surfaces after use. A cleaning fee will be applied based on the time spent cleaning any mess left behind.
Label Your Food – Please label any food you store in the fridge with your name and checkout date. We conduct regular clean-outs to maintain freshness.
No Smoking Indoors – We’re a home, not a chimney. Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the building.
No Drugs or Controlled Substances – This includes balloons or any illicit substances.
No Alcohol on the Premises – Please enjoy the nearby bars, but refrain from bringing alcohol onto the property.
Respect Quiet Hours – The backyard is off-limits after 9:00 PM, and loud noise or parties should be avoided after 10:00 PM. Many of our guests need to rest for work or early travel, so please keep noise to a minimum.
No Visitors After 10:00 PM – For the privacy and comfort of all, please do not invite visitors into your room or the property after this hour. Meet them outside or at their place.

Behavior Conditions:
Any behavior that does not align with these guidelines will be addressed at the discretion of the owner or manager, and you may be asked to leave. Please be considerate of others and avoid being "that guest."

Important Note:
Cashless Accommodation – We do not handle cash on-site. Please ensure you provide a valid credit or debit card when booking.
Pre-Authorization – A pre-authorization will be placed on your card when you book or renew your stay. By confirming your reservation, you agree to follow these rules and accept responsibility for any damages caused to the property. If the house rules are not followed or damage occurs, charges will be applied directly to your card.

Business Information:
Cleaning Hours:
8:00 AM – 12:00 PM
2:00 PM – 6:00 PM
8:00 PM – 12:00 AM
Office Hours:
2:00 PM – 6:00 PM Daily

After-Hour Assistance:
In case you require assistance after hours, please do not email or use third-party chats. Instead, reach us directly by texting or calling our office number +61 428 881 624, or by buzzing the doorbell. Our night staff are on-site and will be glad to assist you.


Thank you for choosing us! We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy your time with us!

houseRules.notes:
Dear Guest
It is our pleasure to welcome you to our hostel.
Our office is open at flexible hours and we are providing a self check-in facility. Office Hours between 10am to 4pm. Please contact property directly for check in after office hours. 
To complete your reservation please fill new guest form and attached your photo ID (part of the form)
Once we receive your form we will send SMS message to your mobile number with instruction how to access your electronic door lock
If you are unable to complete that form please call us , half an hour before your arrival time and we will meet you at the hostel.
You can access our New Guest form at: http://patmilia.com/GuestForm.php
For your safety and support, our Night Manager can assist you on your arrival.
If you have any questions or concerns call us
We are a family-run business and pride ourselves on offering an enjoyable and comfortable stay for all our guests. Whether you are staying with us whilst working, travelling, on holiday or just stopping by, we offer a friendly and welcoming vibe and a home from home experience. To help us ensure that all our guests including enjoy their time here, we ask you to respect the following guidelines. 

Let us start with the basic

* Rent is due in advance  so have your dollar ready to secure your booking
* Treat all staff & guests respectfully and no one likes a douchebag, so just be nice, okay?!
* Our kitchen closes at 10pm. So get your food and midnight snacks prepped and cooked before
* Clean up your dishes & surfaces after cooking. We do not want the hangry feeling to kick in for the other guests because you have not done your dishes! ($25 may apply if staff have to clean up your mess)
* Label your food with your name & date of check out. We like our fridges to be smelling sweet not sour, and so we do regular fridge clean outs.

Then there are a few no goes. 

*Don't  smoke inside the building ( we are a home, not a chimney and it is safety hazard)
*Don't take any drugs on the property (that includes balloons)
*Don't drink alcohol on the property (there isplenty of bars nearby)
*Don't use or go in the backyard after 10pm (our neighbours do not like it)
*Don't be loud or party after 10pm (some people have to be up in the mornings)
* No visitors after 10pm, and don't let them in your room at any time (maybe go to their place)

Ps: The serious side note. Any behaviour which does not align with these guidelines is subject to the owner/managers discretion and you will be asked to leave ( so please do not be THAT GUEST okay! Simples! 

But the great news. 

* We have high speed free WiFi
* Entertainment room showing all sports channels around the world including live broadcasts and latest selection of movies for free
* There is  a huge backyard with tables, chairs and free BBQ for you to enjoy. And yoga mats if you are feeling the need to zen again, just keep the area clean ($25 may apply if not)

So now that is done with enjoy your stay and let us know if there is anything you need to make your stay more comfortable.

PodBed Coogee Beachside
